news.title: You need to listen to the cosmic horror-comedy podcast Welcome to Night Vale
news.summary: It's relatively rare for a podcast to last 14 years, especially a fiction one. In fact, as far as I can tell, Welcome to Night Vale is the longest continually running fiction podcast out there. (Some will argue it's actually We're Alive, but that has taken a few significant breaks between seasons.)
